kālena alpena bhagaṇam bhuṅkte alpa bhramaṇa āśritaḥ

original: 12.76b: grahaH kālena mahatā maṇḍale mahati bhraman//
analyzed: grahah kālena mahatā maṇḍale mahati bhraman
su alpa yātaḥ bahūn bhuṅkte bhagaṇān

original: 12.77b: mahatyā kakṣayā gacchan tataH svalpaṃ śanaiścaraH//
analyzed: mahatyā kakṣayā gacchan tatas su alpam śanaiścaraḥ

original: 12.78a: mandād adhaH krameṇa syuś caturthā divasādhipāH/
analyzed: mandāt adhas krameṇa syuḥ caturthāḥ divasa adhipāh
varṣa adhipatayaḥ tadvat tṛtīyāḥ ca prakīrtitāḥ
ūrdhva krameṇa śaśinaḥ māsānām adhipāḥ smṛtāḥ ahiḥ masānām
sūrya tanayāt kramaśas tathā
sarva upariṣṭāt bhramati yojanaiḥ taiḥ bha maṇḍalam
kalpa ukta candra bhagaṇāḥ guṇitāḥ śaśi kakṣayā

original: 12.81b: ākāśakakṣā sā jñeyā karavyāptis tathā raveH//
analyzed: ākāśakakṣā sā jñeyā karavyāptiḥ tathā
sā eva yat kalpa bhagaṇaiḥ bhaktā tat bhramaṇam bhavet
ku vāsaraiḥ vibhajya ahnaḥ sarveṣām prāk gatiḥ smṛtā
bhukti yojana jā saṅkhyā sa indoḥ bhramaṇa saṅguṇā

original: 12.83b: svakakṣāptā tu sā tasya tithyāptā gatiliptikā//
analyzed: sva kakṣa āptā tu sā tasya tithi āptā gati liptikā
kakṣā bhū karṇa guṇitā mahī maṇḍala bhājitā
tad karṇā bhūmi karṇa ūnā graha uccyam svam
kha traya abdhi dvi dahanāh kakṣā tu
jña śīghra sya aṅka kha dvi tri t kṛta śūnya indavaḥ
śukra śīghrasya
tatas arka budha śukrāṇām
kujasya api
candra uccasya
svarbhānoḥ
bhānām
brahmāṇḍa sampuṭa paribhramaṇam samantāt abhyantare dinakarasya kara prasāraḥ
jyotiṣā upaniṣad

original: 13.01a: atha gupte śucau deśe snātaH śucir alaṅkṛtaH/
analyzed: atha gupte śucau deśe snātaḥ śuciḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: 13.01b: sampūjya bhāskaraṃ bhaktyā grahān bhāny atha guhyakān//
analyzed: sampūjya bhāskaram bhaktyā grahān bhāni atha guhyakān
pāramparya upadeśena yathājñānam guroḥ mukhāt
ācāryaḥ śiṣya bodha artham sarvam pratyakṣa darśivān
abhīṣṭam pṛthivī golam kārayitvā tu dāravam
daṇḍam tad madhya gam meroḥ ubhayatra vinirgatam
ādhāra kakṣā dvitayam kakṣā vaiṣuvatī tathā

original: 13.05a: bhagaṇāṃśāṅgulaiH kāryā dalitais tisra eva tāH/
analyzed: bhagaṇa aṃśa aṅgulaiḥ kāryāḥ dalitaiḥ tisraḥ eva tāḥ
sva ahorātra ardha karṇaiḥ ca tad pramāṇa anumānataḥ
krānti vikṣepa bhāgaiḥ ca dalitaiḥ dakṣiṇa uttaraiḥ

original: 13.06b: svaiH svair apakramais tisro meṣādīnām apakramāt//
analyzed: svaiḥ svaiḥ apakramaiḥ tisraḥ meṣa ādīnām apakramāt

original: 13.07a: kakṣāH prakalpayet tāś ca karkyādīnāṃ viparyayāt/
analyzed: prakalpayet tāḥ ca karki ādīnām viparyayāt
tadvat tisraḥ tulā ādīnām mṛga ādīnām vilomatas
yāmya gola āśritāḥ kāryāḥ kakṣādhārāt dvayoḥ api
yāmya udak gola saṃsthānām bhānām abhijitaḥ tathā
saptarṣīṇām agastyasya brahma ādīnām ca kalpayet

original: 13.09b: madhye vaiṣuvatī kakṣā sarveṣām eva saṃsthitā//
analyzed: madhye vaiṣuvatī kakṣā sarveṣām eva saṃsthitā
tad ādhāra yuteḥ ūrdhvam ayane viṣuvat vayam
kṣetrāṇi evam aja ādīnām prakalpayet

original: 13.11b: ayanād ayanaṃ caiva kakṣā tiryak tathāparā//
analyzed: ayanāt ayanam ca eva kakṣā tiryak tathā aparā

original: 13.12a: krāntisañjñā tayā sūryaH sadā paryeti bhāsayan/
analyzed: krānti sañjñā tayā sūryaḥ sadā paryeti bhāsayan

original: 13.12b: candrādyāś ca svakaiH pātair apamaṇḍalam āśritaiH//
analyzed: candra ādyāḥ ca svakaiḥ pātaiḥ apamaṇḍalam āśritaiḥ
tatas apakṛṣṭāḥ dṛśyante vikṣepa anteṣu apakramāt

original: 13.13b: udayakṣitije lagnam astaṃ gacchac ca tadvaśāt//

analyzed: madhya kṣitijayoḥ madhye yā jyā sā antyā abhidhīyate
jñeyā carat ala jyā ca viṣuvat kṣitija antaram
kṛtvā upari svakam sthānam madhye kṣitija maṇḍalam
vastra channam bahis ca api lokālokena veṣṭitam
prasādhayet

original: 13.17b: gopyam etat prakāśoktaṃ sarvagamyaṃ bhaved iha//
analyzed: gopyam etat prakāśa uktam sarva gamyam bhavet iha
tasmāt guru upadeśena racayet golam uttamam
yuge yuge samucchinnā racanā iyam vivasvataḥ

original: 13.19a: prasādāt kasyacid bhūyaH prādur bhavati kāmataH/
analyzed: prasādāt kasyacid bhūyas prādur bhavati kāmatah
kāla saṃsādhana arthāya tathā yantrāṇi sādhayet
ekākī yojayet bījam yantre vismaya kāriṇi
śaṅku yaṣṭi dhanuḥ cakraiḥ chāyāyantraiḥ anekadhā
guru upadeśāt vijñeyam kāla jñānam atandritaiḥ
toya yantra kapāla ādyaiḥ mayūra nara vānaraiḥ
sa sūtra reṇu garbhaiḥ ca samyak kālam prasādhayet
pāradāra ambu sūtrāṇi śulva taila jalāni ca

original: 13.22b: bījāni pāṃsavas teṣu prayogās te +api durlabhāH//
analyzed: bījāni pāṃsavaḥ teṣu prayogāḥ te api durlabhāḥ
tāṃra pātram adhas chidram nyastam kuṇḍe amala ambhasi

original: 13.23b: ṣaṣṭir majjaty ahorātre sphuṭaṃ yantraṃ kapālakam//
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ majjati ahorātre sphuṭam yantram kapālakam

original: 13.24a: narayantraṃ tathā sādhu divā ca vimale ravau/
analyzed: narayantram tathā sādhu divā ca vimale ravau
chāyā saṃsādhanaiḥ proktam kāla sādhanam uttamam
graha nakṣatra caritam jñātvā golam ca tattvataḥ
graha lokam avāpnoti paryāyeṇa ātmavān
māna

original: 14.01a: brāhmaṃ divyaṃ tathā pitryaṃ prājāpatyaṃ guros tathā/
analyzed: brāhmam divyam tathā pitryam prājāpatyam guroḥ tathā

original: 14.01b: sauraṃ ca sāvanaṃ cāndram ārkṣaṃ mānāni vai nava//
analyzed: sauram ca sāvanam cāndram ārkṣam mānāni vai nava
caturbhiḥ vyavahāraḥ atra saura cāndra ārkṣa sāvanaiḥ

original: 14.02b: bārhaspatyena ṣaṣṭyabdaṃ jñeyaṃ nānyais tu nityaśaH//

analyzed: saureṇa dyu niśoḥ mānam ṣaḍaśīti mukhāni ca
ayanam viṣuvant ca eva saṃkrāntā ih puṇya kāla tā
tulā ādi ṣaḍaśīti ahnām ṣaḍaśīti mukham kramāt
tat catuṣṭayam eva syāt dvi svabhāveṣu rāśiṣu

original: 14.05a: ṣaḍviṃśe dhanuṣo bhāge dvāviṃśe nimiṣasya ca/
analyzed: ṣaḍviṃśe dhanuṣaḥ bhāge dvāviṃśe nimiṣasya ca
mithuna aṣṭādaśe bhāge kanyāyāḥ tu caturdaśa

original: 14.06a: tataH śeṣāṇi kanyāyā yāny ahāni tu ṣoḍaśa/
analyzed: tatas śeṣāṇi kanyāyāḥ yāni ahāni tu ṣoḍaśa

original: 14.06b: kratubhis tāni tulyāni pitṝṇāṃ dattam akṣayam//
analyzed: kratubhiḥ tāni tulyāni pitṝṇām dattam akṣayam

original: 14.07b: ayanadvitayaṃ caiva catasraH prathitās tu tāH//
analyzed: ayana dvitayam ca eva catasrah prathitāḥ tu tāh
tad antareṣu saṃkrānti dvitayam dvitayam punar
nairantaryāt tu saṃkrānteḥ jñeyam viṣṇupadī dvayam
bhānoḥ makara saṅkrāntā iha ṣaṭ māsāḥ uttarāyaṇam

original: 14.09b: karkyādes tu tathaiva syāt ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam//
analyzed: karki ādeḥ tu tathā eva syāt ṣaṣ māsāḥ dakṣiṇāyanam
dvirāśinātha ṛtavaḥ tatas api śiśira ādayaḥ

original: 14.10b: meṣādayo dvādaśaite māsās tair eva vatsaraH//
analyzed: meṣa ādayaḥ dvādaśā ete māsāḥ taiḥ eva vatsaraḥ
arka māna kalāḥ ṣaṣṭyā guṇitāḥ bhukti bhājitāḥ

original: 14.11b: tadardhanāḍyaH saṅkrānter arvāk puṇyaṃ tathā pare//
analyzed: tad ardha nāḍyaḥ saṅkrānteḥ arvāk puṇyam tathā pare

original: 14.12a: arkād viniHsṛtaH prācīṃ yad yāty aharahaH śaśī/
analyzed: arkāt vinihsṛtah prācīm yat yāti ahar ahar śaśī

original: 14.12b: tac cāndramānam aṃśais tu jñeyā dvādaśabhis tithiH//
analyzed: tat cāndramānam aṃśaiḥ tu jñeyā dvādaśabhiḥ

original: 14.13a: tithiH karaṇam udvāhaH kṣauraṃ sarvakriyās tathā/
analyzed: tithiḥ karaṇam udvāhaḥ kṣauram sarva kriyāḥ tathā
vrata upavāsa yātrāṇām kriyā cāndreṇa gṛhyate

original: 14.14a: triṃśatā tithibhir māsaś cāndraH pitryam ahaH smṛtam/
analyzed: triṃśatā tithibhiḥ māsaḥ cāndrah pitryam ahah smṛtam

original: 14.14b: niśā ca māsapakṣāntau tayor madhye vibhāgataH//
analyzed: niśā ca māsa pakṣa antau tayoḥ madhye vibhāgataḥ
nakṣatra nāmnā māsāḥ tu jñeyāḥ parva anta yogatah
kārtikī ādiṣu saṃyoge kṛttikā ādi dvayam dvayam

original: 14.16b: antyopāntyau pañcamaś ca tridhā māsatrayaṃ smṛtam//
analyzed: antya upāntyau pañcamaḥ ca tridhā māsa trayam smṛtam

original: 14.17a: vaiśākhādiṣu kṛṣṇe ca yogaH pañcadaśe tithau/
analyzed: vaiśākha ādiṣu kṛṣṇe ca yogaḥ pañcadaśe tithau
kārttika ādīni varṣāṇi guroḥ asta udayāt tathā

original: 14.18a: udayād udayaṃ bhānoH sāvanaṃ tat prakīrtitam/
analyzed: udayāt udayam sāvanam tat prakīrtitam

original: 14.18b: sāvanāni syur *etena yajñakālavidhis tu taiH//(ḍ etana)
analyzed: sāvanāni syuḥ etena yajña kāla vidhiḥ tu etana
sūtaka ādi paricchedaḥ dina māsa abda pāḥ tathā
madhyamā graha bhuktiḥ tu sāvanena eva gṛhyate
sura asurāṇām anyonyam ahorātram viparyayāt

original: 14.20b: yatproktaṃ tad bhaved divyaṃ bhānor bhagaṇapūraṇāt//
analyzed: yat proktam tat bhavet divyam bhānoḥ bhagaṇa pūraṇāt
manvantara vyavasthā ca prājāpatyam udāhṛtam

original: 14.21b: na tatra dyuniśor bhedo brāhmaṃ kalpaH prakīrtitam//
analyzed: na tatra dyu niśoḥ bhedaḥ brāhmam kalpaḥ prakīrtitam
etat te parama ākhyātam rahasyam parama adbhutam
brahma etat paramam puṇyam sarva pāpa praṇāśanam

original: 14.23a: divyaṃ cārkṣaṃ grahāṇāṃ ca darśitaṃ jñānam uttamam/
analyzed: divyam ca ārkṣam grahāṇām ca darśitam jñānam uttamam
vijñāya arka ādi lokeṣu sthānam prāpnoti śāsvatam

original: 14.24a: ity uktvā mayam āmantrya samyak tenābhipūjitaH/
analyzed: iti uktvā mayam āmantrya samyak tena abhipūjitaḥ
divam ācakrame arka aṃśaḥ praviveśa sva maṇḍalam

original: 14.25a: mayo +atha divyaṃ tajñānaṃ jñātvā sākṣād vivasvataH/
analyzed: mayaḥ atha divyam jñātvā sākṣāt vivasvatah
kṛtakṛtyam iva ātmānam mene nirdhūta kalmaṣam

original: 14.26a: jñātvā tam ṛṣayaś cātha sūryalabdhavaraṃ mayam/
analyzed: jñātvā tam ṛṣayaḥ ca atha sūrya labdha varam mayam
paribabruḥ upetya atho jñānam papracchuḥ ādarāt

original: 14.27a: sa tebhyaH pradadau prīto grahāṇāṃ caritaṃ mahat/
analyzed: sa tebhyah pradadau prītaḥ grahāṇām caritam mahat
ati adbhutatamam loke rahasyam brahma sammitam
